2.title: Element0
2.description:
A first person puzzle and shooter game, developed by "Entropy Games" at U-tad, based on parallel dymensions. The main objective is to use a weapon, which has the ability of swaping a cubic space of two dimensions, to solve the problems that the protagonist will encounter along the game (either puzzles or enemies).

Developed using:
    - C++
    - Unreal Engine

Press articles:
    - IGN
    - Vandal
